sentence.text: Herein, we newly identified that truncated form of sister chromatid cohesion is produced and released from lung tumor tissue in a mouse model expressing human EML4-ALK fusion gene.

The correlation between the tumor size and the amount of sister chromatid cohesion secretion could be examined in this study, and showed a significant positive correlation in a tumor size-dependent manner.
Considering these results, the measurement of circulating sister chromatid cohesion level may contribute to assess a tumor progression in human lung tumor patients
